Class MessageInBottle

java.lang.Object
classes.GiftItem
classes.MessageInBottle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Item
public class MessageInBottle extends GiftItem
MessageInBottle gift item object to be given to the pet.

The MessageInBottle gift item is the mid-tier gift item available for the player to purchase, which is reflected in its medium price. Its impact works differently than the other gift items, with a 50% chance of pet happiness being incremented by 5 points, a 25% chance of 40 points and a 25% chance of -15 points. This class inherits from the GiftItem class.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Cadence Megan McGillicuddy

  • Constructor Details

    • MessageInBottle

      public MessageInBottle()
      MessageInBottle constructor. Creates a new MessageInBottle object using the parent GiftItem's constructor. The MessageInBottle object is initialized with happyEffective = 0, price = 50 and quantity = 0. variable happyEffective is initialized as zero because with each use a different value is generated by below method randEffective.

  • Method Details

    • getHappyEffective

      public int getHappyEffective()
      Calls the randEffective method to retrieve the increment by which the pet's happiness is affected when the item is used.
      Overrides:
      getHappyEffective in class GiftItem
      Returns:
      an integer representing the amount by which to increment the pet happiness.
